Description.description: A friendly description of the policy.

Groups.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the group to attach the policy to.

ManagedPolicyName.description: The friendly name of the policy.

PolicyDocument.description: The JSON policy document that you want to use as the content for the new policy.

Roles.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the role to attach the policy to.

Users.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) of the IAM user to attach the policy to.

PolicyArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the managed policy

AttachmentCount.description: The number of entities (users, groups, and roles) that the policy is attached to.

CreateDate.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was created.

UpdateDate.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format, when the policy was last updated.

DefaultVersionId.description: The identifier for the version of the policy that is set as the default version.

IsAttachable.description: Specifies whether the policy can be attached to an IAM user, group, or role.

PermissionsBoundaryUsageCount.description: The number of entities (users and roles) for which the policy is used to set the permissions boundary.

PolicyId.description: The stable and unique string identifying the policy.
